alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 3:12AM EST until February 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches for a storm total up to 5 inches, sleet accumulations of between 1/10 and 2/10 of an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In New Hampshire, Southern Coos, Northern Grafton, Southern Carroll and Northern Coos Counties. In Maine, Northern Oxford County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos
